text: Toca ahe jyane granthadharakammadhalya kaphiranna tyancya gharatuna pahilya hasra (ekatra honyaca) veli kadhale. Tumhala kalpanahi navhati ki te nighatila ani te svatah samajata hote ki tyace majabuta kille tyanna allahacya siksa yatanepasuna vacavuna ghetila. Tevha tyancyavara allaha (ca prakopa) asa thikanahuna ye'una kosalala ki tyanna tyace anumanahi navhati ani tyancya manata allahane bhaya takale, te apalya gharanna apalyaca hatanni osada karita hote ani imana rakhanaryancya hatuna (nasta karita hote) tevha, he dole rakhanaryanno! Bodha grahana kara
